update sys_user
SYS_ACCOUNT = #{sysAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATION_ID = #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
